Description: Normal 0 false false false EN-US JA X-NONE Stellar Mercury 001 Elite - Green Camouflage Quilted Maple, Singlecut Electric Guitar The Factory Direct Music difference Manufacturer direct savings 30-Day money back guarantee 5-year warranty We love our customers! All guitars are professionally setup in-house prior to shipping by our resident guitar luthier who brings his knowledge from his time working as a PRS neck-specialist in Maryland to your guitar today Florida-based family-owned musical instrument distributor, since 2001 Condition and Comments · This guitar has a defective clearcoat spray job, which gives the clearcoat tiny bubbles throughout the guitar. Besides the cosmetic blemishes of the bubbling clearcoat, this guitar has perfect playability. Blink and you’ll miss out on this camo Stellar Guitar! The guitar comes made out of a thick quilted maple cap (NOT a veneer!) and mahogany body. The neck is also a mahogany set neck. It also has a dark rosewood fretboard. The quilted maple top, as well as the body is stained with a military looking green, which makes for a very stealthy looking guitar. The fretboard is rich and dark which also gives an excellent contrast to the shine of the highly detailed pearloid inlays. This guitar has two Stellar OSR humbucker pickups. These pickups give the guitar long sustains that sound excellent with a classic tone that is exactly what you would expect from this kind of guitar. The D-Shape slimline neck is as fast as you are. The medium jumbo frets are shiny, professionally crowned & leveled by hand. Classic looking guitar! The guitar comes made out of a thick quilted maple cap (NOT a veneer!) and mahogany body. The neck is also a mahogany set neck. It also has a dark brown rosewood fret board. Specs Body: Quilted maple top and mahogany body, cream binding, polyurethane clear finish Neck: 24.75” scale, D-Shape profile neck, 1 11/16” nut, polyurethane clear finish Fretboard: Dark rosewood, medium jumbo frets, pearloid Inlays, cream binding Headstock: Angled headstock, painted black on face, cream binding Electronics: x2 Stellar OSR humbucker pickups, 2x volume knob, 2x tone knob, 3-way toggle switch Hardware: Stoptail bridge, diecast tuners, chrome hardware MER001P-GC2
Title: Stellar Mercury 001 Elite - Green Camo Quilt Maple, Singlecut Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: Blemishes from defective clearcoat application, (bubbles in clearcoat).  Besides the cosmetic blemishes this guitar has perfect playability.
